# SafeDownload Manifest Sample
# Constitution: v1.5.0
#
# Format: URL [output_filename] [checksum]
# - One download per line
# - Lines starting with # are comments
# - Empty lines are ignored
# - Output filename is optional (defaults to URL basename)
# - Checksum format: algorithm:hash (e.g., sha256:abc123...)

# Basic download (output defaults to file.zip)
https://example.com/file.zip

# Download with custom output filename
https://example.com/archive-v1.2.3.tar.gz myarchive.tar.gz

# Download with SHA256 checksum verification
https://example.com/important.bin important.bin sha256:e3b0c44298fc1c149afbf4c8996fb92427ae41e4649b934ca495991b7852b855

# Download with SHA512 checksum
https://releases.example.com/v2.0.0/app-linux-amd64 app sha512:cf83e1357eefb8bdf1542850d66d8007d620e4050b5715dc83f4a921d36ce9ce47d0d13c5d85f2b0ff8318d2877eec2f63b931bd47417a81a538327af927da3e

# Large file download
https://mirror.example.com/iso/ubuntu-24.04-desktop-amd64.iso ubuntu.iso sha256:abc123def456789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789abcdef0123456789ab

# Multiple files from same server
https://cdn.example.com/assets/logo.png
https://cdn.example.com/assets/icon.svg
https://cdn.example.com/assets/banner.jpg

# File with spaces in name (output filename required)
https://example.com/my%20document.pdf "my document.pdf"
